pr_title: Prototype for programming exercises with static code analysis

timeline.bodyText: isStaticCodeAnalysisEnabled could be null which might be problematic
timeline.author: krusche
timeline.diffHunk:
@@ -623,10 +628,11 @@ private void createAutomaticFeedback(Result result, String methodName, boolean p
      *
      * @param result the result for which the feedback should be added
      * @param jobs   the jobs list of the requestBody
-     * @return a list of feedbacks itemsstored in a result
+     * @param isStaticCodeAnalysisEnabled flag determining whether static code analysis was enabled
+     * @return a list of feedback items stored in a result
      */
     @SuppressWarnings("unchecked")
-    private Result addFeedbackToResultNew(Result result, List<BambooBuildResultNotificationDTO.BambooJobDTO> jobs) {
+    private Result addFeedbackToResultNew(Result result, List<BambooBuildResultNotificationDTO.BambooJobDTO> jobs, Boolean isStaticCodeAnalysisEnabled) {

replies.bodyText: I've implemented extra checks when creating, importing and editing programming exercises and secured those checks with integration tests. Additionally the database field isStaticCodeAnalysisEnabled is by default false and not nullable. This should be fine
replies.author: kloessst

timeline.bodyText:
in case isStaticCodeAnalysisEnabled is null, this will lead to a null pointer exception.
Either you check for equals Boolean.TRUE or you make sure the value cannot be null which basically means you can use boolean above
timeline.author: krusche

replies.bodyText: See above. I can additionally secure this but it is no problem.
replies.author: kloessst

timeline.message: Added DTOs to handle incoming static assessment data
Merge branch 'develop' into feature/store-static-code-analysis-findings
Store static assessment issues as Feedback. FeedbackService handles the mapping of StaticAssessmentReportDTO to Feedback.
Store static assessment with type AUTOMATIC_STATIC_ASSESSMENT
Display static assessment detail text in result details component. Created a pipe to format the text.
Merge branch 'develop' into feature/store-static-code-analysis-findings
Restructured creating of static assessment feedback.
Fix docs with gradlew spotlessApply
Made FeedbackService imports explicit and added documentation.
Merge branch develop. Resolve conflict in FeedbackType by keeping both new Enum constants.
automatic buildplan setup for sca + checkbox in client
code styling
Merge branch 'feature/store-static-code-analysis-findings' of https://github.com/ls1intum/Artemis into feature/store-static-code-analysis-findings
Merge branch 'develop' into feature/store-static-code-analysis-findings
Show artifact download button only for student programming participations
Filter out static code analysis artifacts for build artifact download
Fix code style
Added integration test checking if feedback with new type is properly saved

timeline.bodyText:
I suggest that we use a text identifier for static code analysis, e.g.
"StaticCodeAnalysisFeedback:<tool.name()>"
timeline.author: krusche
krusche
krusche

Merge branch 'develop' into feature/store-static-code-analysis-findings

# Conflicts:

Merge conflict fixes
Store static code analysis feedback as AUTOMATIC
Rename pipe
Adjust add function to distinguish static code analysis feedback in client
Display static code analysis feedback in result details
Add column enable static code analysis
Extend table programming-exercise-details by a flag determining whether static code analysis is enabled or not
Disable change of static code analysis enabled field on edit
Refactor generation of static code analysis feedback for tests
Static Code Analysis flag cannot change on update or import
Fix and add test for static code analysis distinction
Merge remote-tracking branch 'origin/develop' into feature/store-static-code-analysis-findings
Update test repository template
Setup template for static code analysis only if the option is chosen
Move fast checks up
Check if the static code analysis flag was set for setup and import
Integration tests for static code analysis not null
Use Integer for static code analysis DTO
Fix tests
Process static code analysis reports only if the option was enabled during the creation of a programming exercise
Do not filter out static code analysis feedback
Merge branch 'develop' into feature/store-static-code-analysis-findings
Refactor test setup
Fix test
Only show static code analysis checkbox if programming language is JAVA
Only allow static code analysis for JAVA on server side
Adapt test case handling for static code analysis feedback
Do not generate test cases from static code analysis feedback
Do not use equals for enum comparison
Show in static code analysis enabled in programming exercise details
Use a static method because Feedback objects are not proper instances of Feedback class
Fix method call
Move enable static code analysis radio
Reset static code analysis flag when switching to another programming language not supporting this option
Merge branch 'develop' into feature/store-static-code-analysis-findings
Extend StaticCodeAnalysisTool enum and use it create the build plan in a generic way
Fix command builder
Set hasFeedback properly if static code analysis found issues
Enhance feedback display
Merge branch 'develop' into feature/store-static-code-analysis-findings
Fix edge case in build plan command creation method
Merge branch 'feature/store-static-code-analysis-findings' of https://github.com/ls1intum/Artemis into feature/store-static-code-analysis-findings
Fix test and comments
Use StringJoiner
Fix DTO field name (must match the notification name)
Improve readability
Increase build log entries fetched from bamboo and filter out more useless logs

timeline.bodyText:
Is that something that is caused by spotbugs or by Bamboo?
So if a different tool gets added, do we also have to change something here?
timeline.author: sleiss
timeline.diffHunk:
@@ -850,7 +876,9 @@ private Long calculateScoreForResult(Result result, int skippedTests) {
                         logString.startsWith("[ERROR] For more information about the errors and possible solutions") ||
                         logString.startsWith("[ERROR] Re-run Maven using") ||
                         logString.startsWith("[ERROR] To see the full stack trace of the errors") ||
-                        logString.startsWith("[ERROR] -> [Help 1]")
+                        logString.startsWith("[ERROR] -> [Help 1]") ||
+                        logString.startsWith("Unable to publish artifact") ||

replies.bodyText: This logged by bamboo itself if an artifact can't be created. Happens for example if a compilation error occurs and and no Bytecode is available for analysis. This should be fine for other tools as well.
replies.author: kloessst

timeline.message: Extend java test repo readme
Check for ParticipationType directly in template

timeline.bodyText: Does it make sense to put these checks in a separate class (ProgramminExerciseAccessService), since we are using them at least twice? I saw something similar for StudentExams
timeline.author: TobiasPr

replies.bodyText: Do you mean something like ProgrammingExerciseValidationService to validate incoming requests? I think that would be a good pattern in general. But I think this is out of scope for this PR.
replies.author: kloessst
